title: Gold Star Mother's and Family's Day, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation issued by Donald J. Trump on September 25, 2025, designating Sunday, September 28, 2025, as Gold Star Mothers and Families Day. The proclamation honors the sacrifices of military families who have lost loved ones in service to the United States. It acknowledges the profound grief and strength of Gold Star Families, highlighting their enduring impact and the nation's gratitude. The proclamation also mentions a meeting with families of service members lost during the Afghanistan withdrawal in 2021 and expresses a commitment to supporting war fighters and their families. It calls for the display of the U.S. flag and appropriate ceremonies to express the nation's gratitude and respect.
